title: Summoner Icon Question please helpp

embed.description: Create & discover new Champion builds/strategies, check your Summoner statistics and try our powerful LoL charts.

body: Just wondering do anyone know where and how can i get this icon? He is my friend but he wouldn't tell me =(

replies.body: This icon was earned from gifting a Battlecast skin to a friend between November 25, 2014 - December 7, 2014.
